about_the_game:
Easy to Learn, Difficult to Master

SurvivalScape is a thrilling survival-based auto shooter where your goal is to defeat enemies, collect crystals, and level up to become the ultimate hero. Climb the leaderboards and challenge your friends for the top score.

Features:

  • Unique Bosses
  • Multiple Classes
  • Unlockable Maps
  • Boss Rush Mode
  • Weekly Challenge
  • Controller Support
  • Ultra-wide Support
  • Twitch Integration - Have Twitch chat choose your upgrades!

Boss Rush

After clearing a level, you'll unlock Boss Rush mode for that map. Instantly level up to the max and defeat the boss as quickly as possible to achieve the highest score!

Obelisks of Power

Capture and hold an Obelisk of Power for ten seconds to immediately level up your hero.

No Meta Progression

Every run you go from zero to hero, ensuring every player begins with the same advantage. Gain power as you progress, keeping the playing field level for fair scoring.

Weekly Challenge

The weekly challenge randomly selects a map and class, eliminating all random elements. No health potions, no obelisks, no rerolls—just a pure test of skill.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300, Raspberry Pi 4
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 720p
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu LTS or Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Raspberry Pi 5 with overclocking
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 720p

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 720p
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 720p

short_description: Immerse yourself in SurvivalScape, a fast-paced auto-shooter bullet hell! Select your hero from a diverse roster, each boasting unique abilities and play-styles. Battle relentless waves of enemies, gather crystals to level up, and face off against formidable bosses. Can you survive?
supported_languages:
English*, Korean*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
